page.title: 15Games We Play .
page.content: We play many games at school during our playtimes.One popular game which can be played by any number of children is{Black Poison.}A person is chosen to be It,they spread out their hands and fingers and the other people take hold of one finger each.The person who is It tells a story in which each phrase refers to something black.(I saw black cats on a black bag.)As soon as they mention black poison everybody runs away.They are then chased,if they are had they stand 'stuck in the mud'until they are freed by another child.Once you have been had three times you become It.This continues until you want to play another game like Hopscotch. {Hopscotch}is a throwing and jumping game.You need to draw a brickwall pattern of ten numbered squares.
